articles.title: Italy puts brakes on Pirelli's Chinese shareholder - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Rome deemed the sensors installed in Pirelli tires a ‘critical technology of national strategic importance.’
articles.content:
The Italian government has limited the powers of China's Sinochem as a shareholder of tire maker Pirelli on national security grounds.
